com.fasterxml.clustermate.std

Class JdkHttpClientPathBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.api.RequestPathBuilder
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.std.JdkHttpClientPathBuilder

  • public class JdkHttpClientPathBuilder
extends RequestPathBuilder
    Simple RequestPathBuilder implementation that can be used with the default JDK http client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected JdkHttpClientPathBuilder _appendSegment(String segment, boolean escapeSlash) 
      protected String _url() 
      JdkHttpClientPathBuilder addParameter(String key, String value)
      Method that will add a single query parameter in the logical path, with given value.
      JdkHttpClientPathBuilder addPathSegment(String segment)
      Method that will append a single path segment, escaping characters as necessary, including escaping of slash character so that the whole value remains parseable path segment.
      JdkHttpClientPathBuilder addPathSegmentsRaw(String segments)
      Method that will append one or more path segments; contents are only escaped only for mandatory characters, but slashes are NOT escaped, so input may contain multiple segments
      URL asURL() 
      JdkHttpClientPath build()
      Method that will construct the immutable RequestPath instance with information builder has accumulated.
      String getPath()
      Method for returning only the logical "path" part, without including either server part or query parameters.
      String getServerPart()
      Method for returning only the logical "server part", which also includes the protocol (like 'http') and port number, as well as trailing slash.
      String toString()
      Implementations MUST override this to produce a valid URL that represents the current state of builder.
